paragraphs.content: Chapter 7
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 7

paragraphs.content: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee: for he would not walk in Jewry, because the Jews sought to kill him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee: for he would not walk in Jewry, because the Jews sought to kill him.

paragraphs.content: Now the Jews’ feast of tabernacles was at hand.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now the Jews’ feast of tabernacles was at hand.

paragraphs.content: His brethren therefore said unto him, Depart hence, and go into Judæa, that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest.
paragraphs.contentHtml: His brethren therefore said unto him, Depart hence, and go into Judæa, that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest.

paragraphs.content: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret, and he himself seeketh to be known openly. If thou do these things, shew thyself to the world.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret, and he himself seeketh to be known openly. If thou do these things, shew thyself to the world.

paragraphs.content: For neither did his brethren believe in him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For neither did his brethren believe in him.

paragraphs.content: Then Jesus said unto them, My time is not yet come: but your time is alway ready.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then Jesus said unto them, My time is not yet come: but your time is alway ready.

paragraphs.content: The world cannot hate you; but me it hateth, because I testify of it, that the works thereof are evil.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The world cannot hate you; but me it hateth, because I testify of it, that the works thereof are evil.

paragraphs.content: Go ye up unto this feast: I go not up yet unto this feast; for my time is not yet full come.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Go ye up unto this feast: I go not up yet unto this feast; for my time is not yet full come.

paragraphs.content: When he had said these words unto them, he abode still in Galilee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: When he had said these words unto them, he abode still in Galilee.

paragraphs.content: ¶ But when his brethren were gone up, then went he also up unto the feast, not openly, but as it were in secret.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ But when his brethren were gone up, then went he also up unto the feast, not openly, but as it were in secret.

paragraphs.content: Then the Jews sought him at the feast, and said, Where is he?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then the Jews sought him at the feast, and said, Where is he?

paragraphs.content: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him: for some said, He is a good man: others said, Nay; but he deceiveth the people.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him: for some said, He is a good man: others said, Nay; but he deceiveth the people.

paragraphs.content: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple, and taught.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple, and taught.

paragraphs.content: And the Jews marvelled, saying, How knoweth this man letters, having never learned?
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Jews marvelled, saying, How knoweth this man letters, having never learned?

paragraphs.content: Jesus answered them, and said, My doctrine is not mine, but his that sent me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Jesus answered them, and said, My doctrine is not mine, but his that sent me.

paragraphs.content: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God, or whether I speak of myself.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God, or whether I speak of myself.

paragraphs.content: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory: but he that seeketh his glory that sent him, the same is true, and no unrighteousness is in him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory: but he that seeketh his glory that sent him, the same is true, and no unrighteousness is in him.

paragraphs.content: Did not Moses give you the law, and yet none of you keepeth the law? Why go ye about to kill me?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Did not Moses give you the law, and yet none of you keepeth the law? Why go ye about to kill me?

paragraphs.content: The people answered and said, Thou hast a devil: who goeth about to kill thee?
paragraphs.contentHtml: The people answered and said, Thou hast a devil: who goeth about to kill thee?

paragraphs.content: Jesus answered and said unto them, I have done one work, and ye all marvel.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Jesus answered and said unto them, I have done one work, and ye all marvel.

paragraphs.content: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision; (not because it is of Moses, but of the fathers;) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision; (not because it is of Moses, but of the fathers;) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man.

paragraphs.content: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision, that the law of Moses should not be broken; are ye angry at me, because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day?
paragraphs.contentHtml: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision, that the law of Moses should not be broken; are ye angry at me, because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day?

paragraphs.content: Judge not according to the appearance, but judge righteous judgment.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Judge not according to the appearance, but judge righteous judgment.

paragraphs.content: Then said some of them of Jerusalem, Is not this he, whom they seek to kill?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then said some of them of Jerusalem, Is not this he, whom they seek to kill?

paragraphs.content: But, lo, he speaketh boldly, and they say nothing unto him. Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ?
paragraphs.contentHtml: But, lo, he speaketh boldly, and they say nothing unto him. Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ?

paragraphs.content: Howbeit we know this man whence he is: but when Christ cometh, no man knoweth whence he is.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Howbeit we know this man whence he is: but when Christ cometh, no man knoweth whence he is.

paragraphs.content: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught, saying, Ye both know me, and ye know whence I am: and I am not come of myself, but he that sent me is true, whom ye know not.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught, saying, Ye both know me, and ye know whence I am: and I am not come of myself, but he that sent me is true, whom ye know not.

paragraphs.content: But I know him: for I am from him, and he hath sent me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But I know him: for I am from him, and he hath sent me.

paragraphs.content: Then they sought to take him: but no man laid hands on him, because his hour was not yet come.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then they sought to take him: but no man laid hands on him, because his hour was not yet come.

paragraphs.content: And many of the people believed on him, and said, When Christ cometh, will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done?
paragraphs.contentHtml: And many of the people believed on him, and said, When Christ cometh, will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done?

paragraphs.content: ¶ The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him.

paragraphs.content: Then said Jesus unto them, Yet a little while am I with you, and then I go unto him that sent me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then said Jesus unto them, Yet a little while am I with you, and then I go unto him that sent me.

paragraphs.content: Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come.

paragraphs.content: Then said the Jews among themselves, Whither will he go, that we shall not find him? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles, and teach the Gentiles?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then said the Jews among themselves, Whither will he go, that we shall not find him? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles, and teach the Gentiles?

paragraphs.content: What manner of saying is this that he said, Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come?
paragraphs.contentHtml: What manner of saying is this that he said, Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come?

paragraphs.content: In the last day, that great day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying, If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In the last day, that great day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying, If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink.

paragraphs.content: He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.

paragraphs.content: (But this spake he of the Spirit, which they that believe on him should receive: for the Holy Ghost was not yet given; because that Jesus was not yet glorified.)
paragraphs.contentHtml: (But this spake he of the Spirit, which they that believe on him should receive: for the Holy Ghost was not yet given; because that Jesus was not yet glorified.)

paragraphs.content: ¶ Many of the people therefore, when they heard this saying, said, Of a truth this is the Prophet.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Many of the people therefore, when they heard this saying, said, Of a truth this is the Prophet.

paragraphs.content: Others said, This is the Christ. But some said, Shall Christ come out of Galilee?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Others said, This is the Christ. But some said, Shall Christ come out of Galilee?

paragraphs.content: Hath not the scripture said, That Christ cometh of the seed of David, and out of the town of Bethlehem, where David was?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hath not the scripture said, That Christ cometh of the seed of David, and out of the town of Bethlehem, where David was?

paragraphs.content: So there was a division among the people because of him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: So there was a division among the people because of him.

paragraphs.content: And some of them would have taken him; but no man laid hands on him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And some of them would have taken him; but no man laid hands on him.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees; and they said unto them, Why have ye not brought him?
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees; and they said unto them, Why have ye not brought him?

paragraphs.content: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.

paragraphs.content: Then answered them the Pharisees, Are ye also deceived?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then answered them the Pharisees, Are ye also deceived?

paragraphs.content: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him?

paragraphs.content: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed.

paragraphs.content: Nicodemus saith unto them, (he that came to Jesus by night, being one of them,)
paragraphs.contentHtml: Nicodemus saith unto them, (he that came to Jesus by night, being one of them,)

paragraphs.content: Doth our law judge any man, before it hear him, and know what he doeth?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Doth our law judge any man, before it hear him, and know what he doeth?

paragraphs.content: They answered and said unto him, Art thou also of Galilee? Search, and look: for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They answered and said unto him, Art thou also of Galilee? Search, and look: for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet.

paragraphs.content: And every man went unto his own house.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And every man went unto his own house.
